item.title: Kingston General Hospital and Hotel Dieu Hospital
item.description: On April 1, 2017, Kingston Health Sciences Centre (KHSC) began operating as a new “integrated” hospital. Information Session on the Merger Click here information on the info session August 2 & 3, 2017. CUPE Newsletters CUPE Local 1974 Newsletters Nursing News Clerical News PSW News Additional Information Why choose CUPE? CUPE’s detailed guide to PSLRTA I am not in a union, what should I do?
